cards.title: Denmark to make domestic flights fossil fuel free by 2030
cards.description: The European manufacturer Airbus has announced plans to develop hydrogen-fuelled planes that could be operational by 2035.

cards.title: Green label plans for gas and nuclear prompts UE row
cards.description: A European Commission proposal says the two energy sources are key to green transition

cards.title: Alaska 'Icemageddon' warning follows heat record
cards.description: The coldest US state of Alaska has recorded its hottest-ever December day, amid an unusual winter warm spell.

cards.title: Climate change: Storm clouds gather after COP26
cards.description: s the progress that was made at the COP26 Glasgow climate summit already in jeopardy because of challenges in the year ahead?

cards.title: Wildlife's winners and losers of 2021 - and how extreme weather set the tone
cards.description: Wildlife across the UK is increasingly suffering the impacts of extreme weather events and natural disasters

cards.title: Climate change: Huge toll of extreme weather disasters in 2021
cards.description: Weather events, linked to a changing climate, brought misery to millions around the world in 2021 according to a new report.
